honors.title: Awardee of BSI Scholarship Talenta Batch 2
description: Awarded a prestigious scholarship aimed at supporting final-year undergraduate students with financial assistance and career development opportunities.
Demonstrated commitment to academic excellence and professional growth, leveraging the scholarship's resources to achieve career objectives.
Related skills: Leadership, Managerial, Communication, Problem Solving, Time Management, Networking

honors.title: Awardee of BSI Scholarship Prestasi Batch 2
description: Become an awardee of BSI Scholarship Prestasi which aims to build future leaders of people who have character, are trustworthy can be role models, and can contribute to building the community, especially in the Sharia economic industry.
Related skills: Project Management, Sharia Economy Literacy, Personal Branding, Leadership

honors.title: Best Start-Up Project
honors.organization: Faculty of Computer Science Universitas Indonesia
description: Received for extraordinary achievements during the entire software development cycle in the past 6 months.

awards.title: English for Business Communication
description: Achieved an overall score of 98% and completed a short course of 4.5 hours.
